import React ,{useState} from 'react' import Rating from "../Rating/Rating" import {Button , Modal , Form} from "react-bootstrap" const AddMovie = ({addfilm}) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [name , setName] = useState("") const [image , setImage] = useState("") const [rating , setRating] = useState(0) const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleSave=()=>{ let newmovie={ name : name , url :image , rate : rating , id : Math.random() } addfilm(newmovie) setImage("") setName("") setRating(0) setShow(false) } return (

) } export default AddMovie
